name: Data Workspace
text: Repository where source data are harvested and quality controlled. Folders here include the quality controlled sampling data from different sources, and analysis data

name: Data release 001
text: The first data release to be submitted to EurOBIS: the event, sample, and raw sequence IDs for the sampling events between 2018 and 2020

name: Analysis release 001
text: The first analysis data release to be submitted to EurOBIS: the COI bioinformatics results for the sampling events between 2018 and 2020
